hadiths.text: Narrated `Abdullah bin `Amr:"When the sun eclipsed in the lifetime of Allah's Messenger (ﷺ) an announcement was made that a prayer was to be offered in congregation

chapter.ara-name: باب النِّدَاءِ بِالصَّلاَةُ جَامِعَةٌ فِي الْكُسُوفِ
chapter.eng-name: Making a loud announcement of As-Salat (the prayer) in congregation for eclipse
